Contradict fact: The claim that David Jolly "has used money and power to try to … drill off our beaches" contradicts the fact that Jolly has pushed back against offshore drilling in Congress.
Understate: The claim may understate Jolly's opposition to offshore drilling by ignoring his record of pushing back against it in Congress.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to substantiate the accusation that Jolly has used money and power to try to drill off the beaches.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Jolly favors more drilling off the coast of Florida without sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for Jolly's actions and positions on drilling that are not considered in the claim.
